name: Six Flags Fun Park
summary: Six Flags Fun Park brings the entire amusement park onto gaming systems everywhere for the first time! Take a stroll through a familiar world filled with your favorite amusement park games all re-imagined and within a colossal park environment that is sure to keep gamers challenged. Along the way, players will be able to explore the expansive park, customize their characters and play against friends and family with 40 mini games. Enter the fun park and experience all that Six Flags has to offer within your home.
